story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We were born among the mountains and brought this sense of height into a cup of coffee. We choose beans with honest fermentation and careful roasting so that every cup sounds like an echo of peaks — pure, bright and inspiring.
story.paragraph2: Our coffee is not just a drink, but a journey: from the slopes where the best varieties grow, to your morning filled with the harmony of taste. We believe that real coffee is born at the intersection of passion for work and respect for nature. Therefore, in every cup — not only the strength of the mountains, but also the warmth of the hands that created it.
